alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pima County through 545 PM MST... At 500 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Topawa, or 11 miles south of Sells, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Miguel, Ali Chukson, Gu Oidak, Vamori, Cowlic, Choulic, Newfield, Coldfields, Fresnal Canyon, Artesia, Hashan Chuchg, Kots Kug, Kupk, Ali Molina, South Komelik and Itak. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 108 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
